sentences.english: This is the Stone Town in Lijiang, Baoshan Township.
sentences.chinese: 这就是丽江的宝山石头城。

sentences.english: So it got the name city of rocks.
sentences.chinese: 所以呢就起名叫石头城。

sentences.english: Nanjing has many attractions, such as Sun Yat-sen, Jiming Temple, Stone Town.
sentences.chinese: 南京有许多名胜古迹，比如中山陵，鸡鸣寺，石头城。

sentences.english: Seongnam stone beacon towers built for the military stronghold.
sentences.chinese: 石头城南建烽火台，为军事重镇。

sentences.english: Today, let me introduce Stone City bar.
sentences.chinese: 今天，让我来介绍一下石头城吧。
